member.summary: Compares this object to the given parameter
member.returns: True if the given object is a base account and has the same username. False otherwise

member.name: M:OnlineViewingOfGrades.ChangeEmailAddressOfAccountAction.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Instantiates a that allows the provided executor to create accounts.

member.name: M:OnlineViewingOfGrades.ChangeEmailAddressOfAccountAction.ChangeEmailAddressOfStudentAccount(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Changes the email address of the student account into the provided email address
member.returns: True if the email address of the account was changed, false otherwise

member.summary: Instantiates a that allows the provided executor to create accounts.

member.name: M:OnlineViewingOfGrades.CreateStudentAccountAction.CreateStudentAccount(OnlineViewingOfGrades.StudentAccount.Builder,System.String)
member.summary: Attemps to create a student account with the provided username and password.
member.returns: True if the account was successfuly created, False otherwise
